title: Platform Engineer
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Are you the
 **visionary platform engineer** 
 we’re seeking? We’re on a quest to assemble a crew of
 **brilliantly unique thinkers** 
 and together embark on an odyssey poised to
 **democratize marketing** 
 for small businesses. Join us to architect our core systems, integrate powerful tools, and be apart of the backbone that redefines how small businesses harness technology.
   

  

 WHY IDELE?
   

  

 At Idele, we believe that in a
 **post-AI** 
 world, every rule is up for debate. Here, the
 **magic** 
 lies in knowing when to discard the rulebook and when to build on it. As our first dedicated platform engineer, you’ll help build a
 **next-generation** 
 software platform that leverages tools like
 **Lovable** 
 ,
 **n8n** 
 and other
 **no/low-code technologies** 
 , while applying your
 **high-code expertise** 
 to architect a truly functional system. This unique role offers a
 **rare opportunity** 
 to evolve from a traditional Software Engineer into a Product Engineer—using AI to empower development instead of solely writing code.
   

  

 We’re currently building a prototype
 **in-house** 
 to meet our own marketing needs and ensure we validate the idea in real usage scenarios. We want to bring a
 **Platform Engineer** 
 into the fold during the
 **prototyping phase** 
 , so by the time we pivot to building a broader MVP for external clients, you’ll have the background, context, and ownership to make things happen smoothly—and shape the product in ways that truly matter.
   

  

**INNOVATE**
 Collaborate with a dynamic team to architect scalable systems and redefine development using cutting-edge, AI-enhanced no/low-code tools.
   

  

**GROW & EVOLVE**
 Seize a rare learning opportunity at the forefront of emerging technologies, expanding your skillset and shaping the future of efficient, impactful software solutions.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 We’re looking for someone who’s excited about
 **joining early** 
 and be a part of taking our internal prototype to a market-ready MVP. Your objective will be to understand the foundation of the platform alongside the prototyping phase, but your real mission is to
 **rapidly** 
 transition the prototype into a stable MVP that allows us to quickly go to market. As our
 **platform engineer** 
 , you’ll help shape and build the backbone of our marketing platform. You’ll strategize system architectures, implement robust solutions, and manage continuous improvements to ensure we stay ahead of emerging technologies.
   

  

**STRATEGY**
 Design scalable architectures and plan cohesive workflows that integrate our databases (Supabase, Pinecone) and system connections.
   

  

**IMPLEMENTING**
 Build robust n8n workflows, set up database structures, and develop custom components that extend beyond our no-code foundation.
   

  

**MAINTAIN**
 Continuously oversee and refine our systems, adapting to new technologies and ensuring optimal performance.
   

  

 THE PROFILE
   

  

 We’re looking for an experienced, pragmatic engineer who sees beyond the code to the big picture. You’re passionate about crafting efficient, smart solutions that deliver real-world impact and value. Who embraces the dynamic nature of an early startup with enthusiasm and resilience.
   

  

* Passionate about creating efficient, impactful solutions that go beyond just the code.
* Possesses a high-level understanding of system design and rationale behind our approach.
* Comfortable in a startup setting — this isn’t for those still figuring out if this environment is right for them.
* Open to diverse perspectives, adept at balancing established conventions with innovative approaches.
* Committed to the journey, eager to contribute your expertise to a shared vision and long-term success.


**The Skillset**
 We’re seeking a candidate with a strong foundation in frontend development who can build complex, engaging UI components and systems. You should have a solid grasp of web fundamentals—from HTTP to CSS—and be proficient in modern technologies.
   

  

* Broad proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript for backend development.
* Foundational experience with Supabase and Pinecone (or smiliar tools) for database and vector data structures.
* Familiarity with designing and implementing automated sequence-based workflows using n8n or other similar tools.
* Ability to build custom components that extend a no/low-code foundation as needed.
* Understanding of core DevOps principles, API integrations and ensuring seamless system connectivity.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Senior Platform Engineer- Industry HR & Payroll (m/f/d)
   

  

 Are you an experienced and driven Platform Engineer with a passion for automation, quality and cloud infrastructure. Are you excited by the challenge of working in a mixed environment with diverse tech stack? If so, we want you to be part of our innovative team!
   

  

 At Industry HR & Payroll, we're searching for a Senior Platform Engineer who will take a leading position in our journey to transform the public sector into a cloud native landscape.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, implement, and maintain scalable, secure, and highly available cloud infrastructure.
* Develop and optimize containerized infrastructure solutions using Docker and Kubernetes with interoperability for legacy services.
* Collaborate with development teams to create seamless CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, Octopus Deploy and equivalent tools.
* Manage and improve existing OpenStack, Azure or AWS.
* Set technical requirements toward our hosting providers and work proactively to ensure that future needs are met.
* Drive the adoption of best practices in DevSecOps, cloud security, and cost optimization.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex infrastructure issues in a timely manner.


**Qualifications**
* 5+ years of experience in platform engineering or DevOps.
* Familiarity with Kubernetes or other container orchestration platforms.
* Proficiency in Docker and container orchestration.
* Hands-on experience with GitHub for CI/CD pipelines and source code management.
* Solid understanding of Linux systems, networking, and cloud security.
* Proven track record of building and managing production-grade cloud infrastructure.
* Proficient in both spoken and written Swedish and English

title: Senior DevOps ingenjör
description:
**Syntronics interna kompetensnätverk ger dig möjlighet att växa snabbt både tekniskt och i din roll som konsult. Hos oss finns det alltid kunniga kollegor nära till hands som bollplank och inspiratörer.**
 Vi söker en erfaren och driven Senior DevOps ingenjör som vill vara med och utveckla framtidens infrastruktur och automatiserade arbetsflöden. Hos oss får du arbeta i en innovativ miljö där du har möjlighet att påverka och forma våra kunders DevOps-processer.
   

  

**Som Senior DevOps Ingenjör hos oss får du jobba med:**
* Arbeta för att säkerställa att applikationer och pipelines uppfyller deras karv för dirftsättning och testning.
* Utveckla och underhålla skript och funktioner för automatisering av bygg-, test- och distributionsprocesser.
* Övervaka och felsöka problem, inklusive driftsavbrott, problem med nätverksanslutning och andra potentiella flaskhalsar.
* Samarbeta med andra projektmedlemmar för att förbättra pipelineprestanda, säkerhet och skalbarhet.
* Fortlöpande undersöka och utforska nya verktyg och tekniker för att förbättra pipelines effektivitet.


**Vi söker en Senior DevOps Ingenjör som:**
* Har en civil- eller högskoleingenjörsexamen inom data, teknisk fysik eller liknande.
* Har minst 8 års erfarenhet av DevOps-utveckling.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med mjukvarupipelines, inklusive erfarenhet av CI/CD och verktyg som Jenkins, Maven, Gradle, Kubernetes, Vault, Bitbucket, Git, Artifactory, SonarQube.
* Erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling i Java.
* Kan kommunicera flytande på svenska och engelska.


**Meriterande:**
* Kunskaper i skriptspråk som Bash, Python, Groovy eller Golang.
* Kunskaper om Linux/Unix-baserade system och infrastruktur.
* Kännedom om Docker, Rancher, K3S och Kubernetes.


 Vi arbetar för en jämn könsfördelning och ser gärna kvinnliga sökande.
   

  

 Syntronic erbjuder en trygg anställning i en dynamisk och framåtriktad miljö. Att vi är ett team är vår styrka, därför ser vi att du arbetar tillsammans på plats med oss på kontoret – när du inte behövs hos någon av våra kunder förstås!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 På Syntronic blir du en del av en härlig gemenskap där din röst hörs och dina idéer välkomnas. Vi erbjuder flexibla arbetstider, balans mellan arbete och fritid samt regelbundna karriärutvecklingssamtal och interna workshops för din utveckling. Utöver detta får du förmånliga förmåner och försäkringar. Hos oss får du inte bara ett jobb - du får en plats att växa och trivas både personligt och professionellt. Välkommen till Syntronic!
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan, som ska vara oss tillhanda senast 7 maj. Vi arbetar med löpande urval.
   

  

 Av kommunikation- och kvalitetssäkringsskäl ber vi dig att skicka in din ansökan digitalt via vårt system och inte via e-post.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**Om oss**
**Everlight** 
 är konsultbolaget med din karriär i fokus. Här finns det en hel plattform av möjligheter och karriärvägar att vandra – som anställd konsult, underkonsult eller via direktrekrytering. Här finns drivna och ambitiösa kollegor, stöd och bollplank att vända sig till, och framförallt finns det glädje och transparens!
   

  

 Om uppdraget
   

  

 Till en av våra kunder söker vi nu en
 **DevOps Engineer** 
 med stark teknisk bredd och ett stort engagemang för automatisering och plattformsutveckling.
   

  

 Du kommer att ingå i ett specialiserat plattformsteam inom ett Integration Competence Center (ICC), som ansvarar för integrationsplattformar och stödjer andra utvecklingsteam med infrastruktur och utvecklingsstandarder. Uppdraget handlar om att vidareutveckla integrationsplattformen, automatisera underhållsarbetet, samt sätta upp CI/CD-pipelines och andra verktyg för effektiv leverans.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du också att vara delaktig i tekniska val, och du arbetar nära både utvecklingsteamen och övriga IT-organisationen. Miljön är modern och bygger bland annat på AWS och GitOps-principer.
   

  

 Vem är du?
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du är en nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och samarbetsinriktad person. Du gillar att arbeta i teknikens framkant och har ett genuint intresse för DevOps, integration och plattformsutveckling. Du har lätt för att kommunicera med både tekniker och verksamhetsrepresentanter, och uppskattar att arbeta i ett team med stort eget ansvar.
   

  

 För rollen ska du ha...
   

  

 Obligatoriska krav:
   

  

**Minst högskoleexamen** 
 på kandidatnivå inom datateknik, systemvetenskap eller annat likvärdigt datorrelaterat område.
   

  

*Specificera examen och examensår.*
**Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet** 
 i rollen som DevOps engineer eller likvärdig roll där drift, utveckling och automatisering kombinerats.
   

  

**Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet** 
 av GitOps i plattformar som GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket eller motsvarande.
   

  

**Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet** 
 av serverunderhåll.
   

  

**Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet** 
 av cloudtjänster i AWS de senaste 3 åren.
   

  

 Mervärdeskrav:
   

  

 Minst 1 års erfarenhet av
 **Kafka** 
 .
   

  

 Minst 1 års erfarenhet av att
 **ta fram CI/CD-processer** 
 .
   

  

 Minst 1 års erfarenhet av
 **Anypoint** 
 eller motsvarande plattform (t.ex. TIBCO, Talend).
   

  

 Placering och omfattning
   

  

 På kontor i
 **Stockholm** 
 med viss möjlighet till distansarbete.
   

  

 Uppdraget har en omfattning på
 **100 %** 
 och är en
 **konsultanställning via Everlight** 
 .
   

  

 Uppdragets preliminära start är maj/juni

title: Test Automation Engineer
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS :**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description:**
 On behalf of our client, we are looking for a
 **Test Automation Engineer** 
 to join the team working on a new savings platform. This is an exciting opportunity to be a key player in ensuring product quality and delivering a world-class customer experience.
   

  

 In this role you will work within an agile test team in the SI6 Program and focus on developing and implementing test automation. The role involves being involved in the entire process, from design to scripting, executing and reporting results and defects. You will be working closely with your colleagues in the test team to develop and expand the platforms automated test suites. You will also be part of the work defining our strategies for testing and test automation, ensuring that our customers receive a world-class customer experience.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using the following frameworks/tools:
* Playwright (TypeScript) – UI & some API automation
* Selenium (Java) – UI, file validation, reports, and portal testing
* Postman or Insomnia, Swagger – for manual and automated API testing
* Integrate test automation into CI/CD pipelines using Openshift and Jenkins
* Create Jenkinsfiles and manage Openshift namespaces for automation-related projects
* Ensure testing aligns with security and compliance standards
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams in a multicultural environment


**Requirements:**
* 6+ years in software quality assurance and test automation
* Strong hands-on experience with:
* Playwright, Selenium (UI automation)
* Postman, Swagger (API testing)
* Java, JavaScript/TypeScript for writing automation scripts
* Creating automation frameworks from scratch
* Understanding of microservices architecture and associated testing strategies
* Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI
* Knowledge of frontend technologies (React, HTML/CSS, JavaScript testing)
* Proficiency in SQL and database testing
* Strong communication skills in English (spoken and written)


**Desired Personal Attributes**
* Collaborative and communicative, with a team-first mindset
* Enthusiastic, self-driven, and proactive in solving problems
* Open-minded, respectful, and supportive of colleagues
* Curious, innovative, and constantly seeking improvements
* Comfortable working in a diverse and multicultural environment


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How to Apply:**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior Technical Account Manager, Telco Vertical
description:
**Description**
 Would you like to join one of the fastest-growing organizations within Amazon Web Services (AWS), and help customers of all industries and sizes gain the best value and service from AWS? AWS Enterprise Support, Technical Account Managers (TAM) support our customers’ creative and transformative spirit of innovation across all technologies - including Compute, Storage, Database, Big Data, Application-level Services, Networking, Serverless, Deployment, Security and more. This is not a sales role, but rather an opportunity to be the principal technical advisor and ‘voice of the customer’ to organizations ranging from start-ups to Fortune 500 enterprises.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 As a TAM, you will help craft and execute strategies to drive our customers’ adoption and use of AWS services - including EC2, S3, DynamoDB & RDS databases, Lambda, CloudFront CDN, IoT, and many more. Your technical acumen and customer-facing skills will enable you to effectively represent AWS within a customer’s environment, and drive discussions with senior leadership regarding incidents, trade-offs, support, and risk management.
   

  

 You will provide advocacy and strategic technical guidance to help plan and build solutions using best practices, and proactively keep your customers’ AWS environments operationally healthy. The close relationships developed with your customers will allow you to understand their business/operational needs and technical challenges, and help them achieve the greatest value from AWS. This position will require the ability to travel 10% or more as needed.
   

  

 Watch a short video about life as a Technical Account Manager here: https://bit.ly/3aHfaE0
   

  

 The TAM is the centerpiece of value to our Enterprise Support customers. If you wish to be at the forefront of innovation, come join us!
   

  

 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The
   

  

 AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* You’ll advise on solutions, provide technical guidance and advocate for the customer
* Ensure AWS environments remain operationally healthy whilst reducing cost and complexity
* Develop trusting relationships with customers, understanding their business needs and technical challenges
* Using your technical acumen and customer obsession, you’ll drive technical discussions regarding incidents, trade-offs, and risk management
* Consult with a range of partners from developers through to C-suite executives
* Collaborate with AWS Solutions Architects, Business Developers, Professional Services Consultants, and Sales Account Managers
* With a bias for action, you'll proactively find opportunities for customers to gain additional value from AWS
* Provide detailed reviews of service events, monthly & quarterly metrics, detailed pre-launch planning
* Solve a variety of problems across different customers as they migrate their workloads to the cloud
* Uplift customer capabilities by running workshops, brown bag sessions, etc.


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in technical engineering
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent
* Experience in internal enterprise or external customer-facing environment as a technical lead
* Experience in three (3) or more of the following areas: software design or development, content distribution/CDN, scripting/automation, database architecture, IP networking, IT security, BigData/Hadoop/Spark, operations management, service oriented architecture
* Experience in design/implementation/operations/consulting with distributed applications
* Knowledge of of cloud based architecture, cloud services and experience in customer facing roles


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with AWS services or other cloud offerings
* Experience with operational parameters and troubleshooting for three (4) of the following: compute/storage/networking/CDN/databases/DevOps/big data and analytics/security/applications development in a distributed systems environment
* Experience as a technical account manager, consultant, solutions architect, platform engineer, systems engineer, cloud architect or in a similar role
* Practical knowledge of 5G network architecture and call-flows and experience in troubleshooting 5G networks
* Practical knowledge of OSS/BSS and experience in troubleshooting OSS/BSS products


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2884267

title: Testledare
description:
Testledare - Nohau Stockholm
   

  

 Är du en erfaren testledare med passion för kvalitetssäkring i både utvecklings- och förvaltningsmiljöer? Vill du arbeta med spännande uppdrag hos några av Sveriges mest prestigefyllda företag och vara en del av ett innovativt techbolag?
   

  

**Om Nohau**
 Med ett starkt rykte och hög teknisk kompetens är vi på en spännande väg fylld med nya initiativ och möjligheter. Vi kombinerar spetskompetens inom teknik och IT med ett starkt affärsfokus för att leverera värdeskapande lösningar. Med vår långa branscherfarenhet och ett omfattande nätverk i Norden kan vi agera snabbt och leverera lösningar som gör skillnad.
   

  

 Hos oss möts du av en avslappnad och välkomnande arbetsmiljö där erfarna kollegor delar en passion för teknikens möjligheter. Våra medarbetare, både i Sverige och internationellt, har gedigen erfarenhet och ser till att du får det stöd du behöver för att snabbt känna dig som en självklar del av teamet.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi söker nu en testledare som vill vara en nyckelspelare i vår fortsatta tillväxtresa. Du blir en viktig del av teamet och får möjlighet att arbeta med varierande och utmanande uppdrag – från start till mål. Du kommer att arbeta nära projektledare, förvaltningsledare och verksamhet för att säkerställa hög kvalitet genom hela processen – från kravställning till verifiering och validering.
   

  

 Din primära roll är som testledare, men vi ser gärna att du även kan bidra operativt som testare vid behov.
   

  

**Dina ansvarsområden:**
* Planera, leda och följa upp testarbete – både funktionellt och icke-funktionellt
* Utforma teststrategier, testplaner och annan testdokumentation
* Säkerställa att verksamhetens behov uppfylls genom hela testprocessen
* Driva arbetet med verifiering, validering och riskhantering kopplat till test
* Samverka med utvecklingsteam och andra intressenter för att säkerställa rätt leverans


 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm, och visst resande kan förekomma.
   

  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**
* Genomföra intressentanalys och kravinsamling genom intervjuer, workshops och fältstudier.
* Dokumentera och analysera funktionella och icke-funktionella krav.
* Översätta verksamhetsbehov till tydliga IT-krav och användningsfall.
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam och säkerställa att kraven implementeras korrekt.
* Leda och facilitera workshops och kravforum.
* Bedöma kostnader, risker och avgränsningar i kravhanteringsprocessen.
* Skapa flödesbeskrivningar och stödja verksamheten i förändringsledning.
* Kommunicera tekniska koncept på ett tydligt sätt till olika målgrupper.


**Vi söker dig som:**
 Vi söker dig som har en genomförd högskole-/universitetsutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt. Certifiering inom ISTQB eller REQB är meriterande. Du har flerårig erfarenhet av arbete som testledare och testare, särskilt inom systemtest och acceptanstest.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen tar du gärna initiativ och har en stark drivkraft att nå resultat. Du har ett tydligt fokus på uppgiften och driver ditt arbete framåt på ett självständigt och strukturerat sätt. Du samarbetar väl med andra och har goda ledaregenskaper.
   

  

**Mertiterande:**
* Erfarenhet av kravhantering, där du har definierat behov och förväntningar hos intressenter samt säkerställt att dessa krav omsatts i leveransen.
* Van att arbeta i DevOps-miljöer, där kontinuerlig integration och leverans är en naturlig del av processen.
* Kunskap inom testautomatisering, gärna med verktyg som Robocorp, UiPath eller liknande lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av verifiering och validering inom icke-funktionell testning – såsom prestandatest eller identifiering av säkerhetsbrister i IT-system.


**Kontaktperson** 
 Peter Frisk Consultant Manager
   

  

 Phone: +46 (0)40-59 22 20
   

  

 peter.frisk@nohau.se

title: Applikationsexpert
description:
**Uppdragsbeskrivning:**


En myndighet inom e-hälsoområdet söker en konsult med djupgående kompetens och erfarenhet av Sparx Enterprise Architect, Sparx Prolaborate och Pro Cloud Server.


Uppdraget innebär att erbjuda expertrådgivning och specialiststöd kring användningen av Sparx Enterprise Architect och Prolaborate. Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:

* Anpassning och vidareutveckling av metamodeller.
* Skapande och modifiering av profiler och verktygslådor.
* Utveckling och konfiguration av MDG-teknologi.
* Hantering av tillägg och närliggande produkter.
* Versionshantering av modeller.
* Livscykelhantering av Sparx Enterprise Architect, Sparx Prolaborate och Pro Cloud Server.
* Stöd och utbildning till användare.


Det finns möjlighet att uppdraget anpassas, där konsulten kan komma att delta i projektarbete som specialist.

**Övrig information:**

* Konsulten behöver vara tillgänglig för intervju den 9 maj och vid behov även den 12 maj.

**Obligatoriska krav:**

* Konsulten ska ha kompetensnivå 3 (motsvarande 4–8 års erfarenhet).
* Minst tre (3) års erfarenhet av konfiguration och utveckling i Sparx Enterprise Architect.
* Erfarenhet av konfiguration och administration av Sparx Prolaborate och Pro Cloud Server.
* Konsultens stationeringsort ska anges.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska.

**Önskemål:**

* Inga specifika bör-krav angivna.

**Placering:**

* Kalmar eller Stockholm. Möjlighet till distansarbete kan diskuteras med beställaren.

**Uppdragsperiod:**

* Start: 14 maj 2025
* Längd: 1 år med möjlighet till förlängning i ytterligare 11 månader.

**Omfattning:**

* Cirka 10 timmar per vecka.

 **Om Rasulson Consulting**  

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Business Development Manager - Cloud
description:
**Varför välja TD SYNNEX:**
  

  

Som ett globalt Fortune 500-företag, verksamt i över 100 länder, värdesätter TD SYNNEX sin mångsidiga arbetsstyrka på 24 000 anställda. Som världens största IT-distributör är vårt uppdrag att tillhandahålla förstklassiga teknologilösningar och ge företag och individer möjlighet att navigera i den digitala världen på ett säkert och effektivt sätt.  

  

**Om rollen:**
  

  

Som **Business Developer Manager - Cloud** kommer du att vara ansvarig för att översätta leverantörers/teknologiers tillväxtplaner internt och driva dem i specifika strategiska segment.  

  

**Vad du kommer att göra:**
  

* **Öka lönsam marknadsandel** genom att genomföra affärsenhetens strategi i full överensstämmelse under tydlig ledning.
* **Förhandla om viktiga anbud** och större affärer med full kunskap om alla arbetsfunktioner samt bred branschkunskap, bästa praxis, tekniker och standarder.
* Optimera resultat genom att **driva försäljning från överenskomna leverantörsportföljer inklusive identifiering av nya leverantörer** , onboarding och andra affärsutvecklingsinitiativ.
* Driva övergripande leverantörshantering och skapa unika kundvärdeerbjudanden som skyddar marginalintegriteten och främjar långsiktigt värdebaserat kundengagemang.
* Möjliggöra och stötta säljteam att vinna och öka kundandelar och marknadsandelar.
* Bibehålla fullständig kunskap om tilldelad leverantörs produkt- och tjänsteutbud.

  

**Vad vi gärna ser hos dig:**
  

* 3+ års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med **AWS/Azure/GCP** .
* Flytande i svenska och engelska.
* Stark kommunikativ förmåga, både muntligt och skriftligt.

  

**Ansökan**
  

  

Vi behandlar ansökningar löpande och uppmuntrar dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. Sista ansökningsdag är måndag den 12 maj och vi ser fram emot din ansökan.
  

  

Vill du veta mer om TD SYNNEX kan du läsa om oss på: TD SYNNEX Sweden
  

  

Vi arbetar dessutom aktivt med mångfald och har en nordisk grupp, "Elevate", med engagerade kollegor från Norden som fokuserar på könsdiversitet. Vi värdesätter karriärutveckling och välmående högt - vi är bland annat certifierade som ett Great Place to Work. Vi arbetar utifrån Servant Leadership, där den viktigaste uppgiften för en ledare är att finnas där för sitt team och se till att teamet lyckas.
  

  

#LI-LT1
  

  

#LI-HYBRID
  

  

**Key Skills**  

  

**What's In It For You?**  

* **Elective Benefits:** Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
* **Grow Your Career:** Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
* **Elevate Your Personal Well-Being:** Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
* **Diversity, Equity & Inclusion:** It's not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
* **Make the Most of our Global Organization**: Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
* **Connect with Your Community:** Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.

  

**Don't meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.**  

  

At TD SYNNEX, we're proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you're excited about working for our company and believe you're a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we're looking for!

title: Detection Engineer - Google SecOps
description:
We are seeking a skilled Detection Engineer – Google SecOps to enhance and develop detection methods for our CyberSOC services, focusing on defending against current and emerging threats. In this role, you will be instrumental in evolving our detection capabilities within Google SecOps, ensuring our security services remain robust, effective, and aligned with the latest threat landscape.


As a Detection Engineer, you will collaborate with Technical Delivery Managers, Lead Security Analysts, Service Owners, and other key stakeholders to refine our detection models, improve service quality, and deliver actionable intelligence to our security analysts. Your work will directly contribute to strengthening our Managed Threat Detection services and maintaining our position as a leader in cybersecurity.

**Responsibilities:**

* Continuously develop and refine detection models to enhance the capabilities and quality of our Google SecOps services.
* Monitor and analyze global threat indicators, providing actionable suggestions for improvement.
* Design and implement new detection rules and indicators to address high-severity global threats.
* Reduce false positives and improve the quality of information delivered to security analysts.
* Test and validate the detection capabilities of our services and related products.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation related to detection methods and supported services.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to track and elevate the development of our security services.
* Collaborate with Service Design teams to improve the process and technical aspects of the service, including threat detection, incident response, and compliance monitoring.
* Develop and optimize security automation workflows, reducing manual intervention.
* Automate detection, response, and remediation processes using SOAR and scripting.

**Key Responsibilities – Strategic**

* Continuously develop our detection models to improve capabilities and quality.
* Monitor the results of our indicators from a global perspective and provide suggestions for improvement.
* Increase the quality of information presented to analysts and improve efficiency of analysis of incidents.
* Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to improve service quality and track the development of our services.

**Key Responsibilities – Tactical/Operational**

* Develop new indicators for Managed Threat Detection services.
* Maintain and update our detection library.
* Gather and interpret statistics to determine potential improvements.
* Continuously test the detection capabilities of our services and related products.
* Maintain documentation related to detections and supported services.

**Who you are:**

  

You are a proactive, detail-oriented professional with a passion for cybersecurity and threat detection. You thrive in dynamic environments, enjoy tackling complex challenges, and are committed to delivering high-quality outcomes. A natural collaborator, you excel at working with diverse teams, providing insights that drive meaningful improvements. You are curious about emerging threats and technologies, and you take pride in staying ahead of the curve to protect our services and customers.


Additionally, you embody our core values:


* Technology-first approach
* Humble commitment
* Innovator
* Respect for people and commitment
* Simplicity in mind
* Trust in each other

 **We prefer that you have experience in the following areas:**

* 3+ years of experience as a Security Analyst or equivalent Security roles.
* Deep understanding of Google Cloud Security services.
* Experience in creating and tuning Google SecOps detections.
* Hands-on experience with SIEM, SOAR, EDR, XDR, and/or threat intelligence tools.
* Knowledge of security frameworks and compliance standards (ISO 27001, NIST, CIS, GDPR).
* Solid understanding of common threats and TTPs, with prior experience working with the MITRE framework (whether through threat hunting or gap analysis).
* Ability to lead and collaborate across teams.
* Experience in Python development, including being able to analyze code and write applications and/or scripts.

**Bonus**

* Experience in using version control software and CI/CD for managing detection rules.
* Experience in developing and tuning detections in Sentinel, Defender and Cortex.
* Working with Infrastructure as Code using Terraform.

**The story of Orange Cyberdefense**


Orange Cyberdefense is Sweden’s leading company in cyber security. Our vision is to contribute to a safer digital society by fighting different kinds of cybercrimes. We have about 3000 employees worldwide and 400 in Sweden. We offer our customers services within Anticipate, Identity, Protect, Detect and Respond.


At Orange Cyberdefense, we are all different but with the same passion; and that is our greatest strength. We are proud of our individual differences, experiences and histories and are convinced that we must include everyone to be able to offer solutions that protect everyone. That is why we always make sure to treat all applications equally.

**Our offer**


As an employee at Orange Cyberdefense, you will get the opportunity to work closely with some of the experts in the field and in an innovative and friendly company where we together contribute to the continued development of the company.


With the latest technology, customers in the Nordics region and a growing company supporting you, you are given the opportunity to create and contribute to a safer society.


Working at Orange Cyberdefense will give you the chance to develop both personally and professionally. New challenges are our favorite challenges. Orange Cyberdefense has an environment with a high rate of change, quick decision-making, combined with sensitivity to our employees. We believe that by providing an atmosphere where we try to have fun at work and love what we do, we will also get the best end results.  

  

We look forward to receiving your application!


**Contrat**
-----------

CDI

title: ServiceNow Lead Architect
description:
**Some highlights**
-------------------

* Being part of an international company yet with local presence
* Build a safer digital society together with us

**Working as a ServiceNow Lead Architect**
------------------------------------------


We are looking for a **ServiceNow Lead Architect** who embodies a challenger mentality, ready to own and drive platform innovation while shaping strategic outcomes for our ServiceNow ecosystem. This individual thrives on solving complex problems with creativity, pushing boundaries, and delivering long-term sustainable solutions.  

  

At **Orange Cyberdefense**, we believe in empowering individuals to take innovative approaches to challenges and redefine what’s possible. If you see yourself as someone full of **self-leadership, drive, and creativity**, this is the place where **the sky is the limit**.
  

  

We encourage bold ideas, foster collaboration, and reward those who take ownership and deliver meaningful impact. If you are a confident & expert **ServiceNow developer or architect** looking to step into a broader role with increased influence and responsibility in the ServiceNow ecosystem, this is the perfect opportunity for you. This position offers a chance to expand your impact by combining technical leadership with strategic decision-making and platform ownership.

### **Responsibilities:**

* Platform Optimization
* ServiceNow Practices & Platform Management
* Code & Configuration Reviews
* Strategic Alignment & Leadership
* Value-Driven Delivery
* Collaboration & Innovation
* Virtual Product Ownership

**What we expect of you**
=========================

* **Hands-On Expertise**: Proven experience as a ServiceNow Architect or Senior Developer with a deep understanding of the platform's architecture, capabilities, and best practices.
* **Platform Management Knowledge**: Expertise in managing on-premises and cloud instances, understanding TCO, and setting up best practices for upgrades, clones, and standardization.
* **Strategic Vision**: The ability to connect tactical solutions to a broader strategy and long-term vision for the platform.
* **Problem-Solving Proficiency**: Creativity in solutioning, combined with the ability to deliver quick, hands-on examples to drive implementation.

* **Innovative Mindset**: Ready to explore new ideas and push boundaries to unlock the platform’s full potential.


At Orange Cyberdefense, **your ambition and leadership determine your growth**. This role is a unique opportunity for those who want to **expand beyond technical expertise** and take on a pivotal position combining architecture, innovation, and product ownership. If you’re ready to lead, innovate, and take the next step in your career, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Cloud & AI Infrastructure Sales Executive
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you want to take ownership of your sales success? Are you a visionary sales specialist with a flair for creative problem-solving and a customer centric approach? If you’re eager to shape the future of industries and make a tangible impact on the world, this is your opportunity to join our fast-paced, motivated sales team and discover unlimited opportunities to grow your career with us.
   

  

 Oracle is at the forefront of the digital transformation, empowering businesses with cutting-edge AI and Cloud Infrastructure solutions, encompassing both Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS). We’re looking for a Cloud & AI Infrastructure Sales Executive to drive force behind advancing customer missions through the power of Oracle's comprehensive cloud portfolio.
   

  

 We have phenomenal career opportunities for every experience level and celebrate a culture of support and learning.
   

  

**Create the future with us!**
**What You Will Do**
 Engage in strategic C-level conversations to uncover cloud transformation opportunities while conducting indepth needs assessments and solution demonstrations.
   

  

 You will collaborate with technical experts to craft tailored cloud proposals and negotiate complex contracts and ensure seamless deal execution by:
   

  

* Evangelizing Oracle's Cloud Vision: Become a trusted advisor to C-level executives, demonstrating how Oracle's AI and Cloud Infrastructure solutions can transform their businesses and drive unprecedented success.
* 
* Leading Transformational Deals: Orchestrate complex sales cycles, navigating technical intricacies and securing buy-in from multiple stakeholders.
* Scaling Cloud Adoption Across Industries: Identify high-potential opportunities across diverse sectors, tailoring Oracle's cloud solutions to address unique challenges.
* Forging Strategic Partnerships: Collaborate with Oracle's partner ecosystem to expand market reach and deliver comprehensive cloud solutions.
* Being a Champion for Customer Success: Ensure seamless implementation and adoption of Oracle's cloud technology, fostering long-term customer relationships.


 Career Level - IC4
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Your Experience**
* Proven Sales Acumen: several years of enterprise software/cloud sales experience, with a track record of exceeding targets and closing multimillion-dollar deals.
* C-Level Engagement: Demonstrated ability to build relationships and influence senior executives across various industries.
* Cloud Passion and Expertise: Deep understanding of cloud technologies (IaaS, PaaS, AI) and their potential applications across different business functions.
* Technical Fluency: Ability to articulate complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Customer-Centric Approach: Unwavering commitment to understanding customer needs and delivering exceptional value.


**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation-request\_mb@oracle.com or by calling +1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Head of Corporate Communications
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 175,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a seasoned and strategic Head of Corporate Communications to lead the development and execution of Sinch's global communications strategy. You'll be responsible for shaping and amplifying our corporate narrative, managing media relations, guiding executive visibility, and aligning messaging across all touchpoints — internally and externally.
   

  

 This is a key leadership role that works closely with our executive team, sustainability function, investor relations, HR, and our central and regional marketing leads in the Americas, EMEA, and APAC to ensure cohesive and impactful communications across the globe.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Strategic Communications Leadership: Develop and implement a comprehensive, globally-aligned corporate communications strategy that supports Sinch's business goals and brand promise.
* Media & Public Relations: Build and manage relationships with top-tier media and key industry voices. Lead proactive storytelling and press engagement to grow Sinch's visibility and relevance.
* Executive Communications: Partner with Sinch's leadership team to craft compelling executive content — including speeches, bylines, and keynotes — that reflects our strategic priorities and brand voice.
* Internal Communications: Design and deliver internal communications that inform, inspire, and engage employees across functions and regions, supporting alignment and cultural cohesion.
* Crisis & Issues Management: Act as the communications lead for sensitive and high-impact situations, ensuring clarity, speed, and coordination in response.
* Financial Communications: Partner with our Investor Relations team to support quarterly earnings and any other financial messaging when necessary
* Sustainability Communications: Partner with our Sustainability organization to communicate Sinch's ESG efforts and achievements to key stakeholders.
* Regional Collaboration: Work hand-in-hand with Regional Marketing teams across the Americas, EMEA, and APAC to align corporate messaging with local market strategies and opportunities.
* Brand Voice & Messaging: Ensure consistent narrative and tone across all communications channels — from press releases and internal updates to social media and digital platforms.
* Agency & Partner Management: Lead and manage relationships with external PR agencies and communication vendors to scale efforts efficiently and effectively.


 The role is based at SINCH HQ in Stockholm and report to the CMO, Jonathan Bean.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Extensive experience in corporate communications, public relations, or brand storytelling — preferably in global B2B tech or SaaS environments.
* Proven success in building and executing integrated communications strategies at scale.
* Exceptional writing, editing, and storytelling skills — with the ability to adapt tone and content across audiences and formats.
* Experience advising senior leaders and managing executive visibility initiatives.
* Skilled in issues management and crisis communication.
* Strong cross-functional communicator with global fluency and cultural awareness.
* Experience working closely with regional marketing or field teams across geographies.
* Leadership skills with experience building collaborative, high-performing teams while staying hands-on.
* Passion for technology, innovation, and purpose-driven communication.
* Fluency in Swedish and English is a requirement.


**OUR HIRING PROCESS**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Founding Engineer
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Are you the
 **audacious software engineer** 
 we’re searching for? We’re on a quest to assemble a crew of
 **brilliantly unique thinkers** 
 and together embark on an odyssey poised to
 **democratize marketing** 
 for small businesses. Join us as the technical
 **Swiss Army knife** 
 who can jump between front-end finesse and back-end muscle—doing whatever it takes to build a generational product that empowers underdogs everywhere.
   

  

 WHY IDELE?
   

  

 At Idele, we believe that in a
 **post-AI** 
 world, every rule is up for debate. Here, the
 **magic** 
 lies in knowing when to discard the rulebook and when to build on it. As our first dedicated software engineer, you’ll help build a
 **next-generation** 
 software platform that leverages tools like
 **Lovable** 
 ,
 **n8n** 
 and other no/low-code technologies, while applying your
 **high-code expertise** 
 to architect a truly functional system. This unique role offers a
 **rare opportunity** 
 to evolve from a traditional Software Engineer into a Product Engineer—using AI to empower development instead of solely writing code.
   

  

 We’re currently building a prototype
 **in-house** 
 to meet our own marketing needs and ensure we validate the idea in real usage scenarios. We want to bring a
 **Founding Engineer** 
 into the fold during the
 **prototyping phase** 
 , so by the time we pivot to building a broader MVP for external clients, you’ll have the background, context, and ownership to make things happen smoothly—and shape the product in ways that truly matter.
   

  

**INNOVATE**
 Collaborate with a dynamic team to architect solutions that integrate advanced large language models, no/low-code platforms, and custom code for maximum impact.
   

  

**GROW & EVOLVE**
 Seize the chance to switch between front-end and back-end projects, expanding your expertise and unleashing your potential in a startup that thrives on curiosity and ambition.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 We’re looking for someone who’s excited about
 **joining early** 
 and be a part of taking our internal prototype to a market-ready MVP. Your objective will be to understand the foundation of the platform alongside the prototyping phase, but your real mission is to
 **rapidly** 
 transition the prototype into a stable MVP that allows us to quickly go to market. You’ll tackle a blend of front-end and back-end tasks, orchestrate our AI integrations, and set the tone for rapid, iterative development.
   

  

**LEARN & INTEGRATE**
 Get up to speed on our prototype’s architecture, user stories, and AI integrations. Propose enhancements where needed while absorbing the intricacies that will shape your work on the MVP.
   

  

**ADAPT & SCALE**
 As we evolve from prototype to MVP, ensure key features are robust, user-friendly, and ready for broader usage. You’ll refine performance, add essential functionality, and tailor the product to new marketing demands.
   

  

**OWN CORE TECH**
 Make critical decisions around front-end, back-end, and infrastructure. Strike the right balance between rapid iteration and laying a solid technological foundation that can grow with us.
   

  

**COLLABORATE & IMPROVE**
 Work closely with the founding team—both marketers and tech minds—to brainstorm, offer feedback, and iterate. Promote best practices and maintain an environment of continuous learning and transparency.
   

  

 THE PROFILE
   

  

 We’re looking for a resourceful, can-do engineer who relishes variety and thrives on exploring both ends of the tech spectrum. You’re confident in a startup environment and excited to take on multiple roles without missing a beat.
   

  

* A problem-solver with a “do whatever it takes” attitude, jumping in wherever needed.
* Comfortable with not knowing everything but figuring it out anyway.
* Eager to balance user-centric design with robust, scalable architectures.
* Comfortable in a startup setting — this isn’t for those still figuring out if this environment is right for them.
* Open to diverse perspectives, adept at balancing established conventions with innovative approaches.


**The Skillset**
 We’re not looking for perfection, we’re looking for the right fit. We’re seeking a well-rounded engineer with a solid grasp of modern web development and the adaptability and drive to learn on the fly. You’ll combine the best of both front-end and back-end worlds.
   

  

* Experience with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
* Familiarity with Node.js, API design, and database principles (Supabase, Pinecone, or equivalent).
* Ability to set up and maintain integrations with external systems through sequence-based workflows via n8n.
* Broad understanding of web fundamentals, including HTTP, CSS, and responsive design.
* Ability to build custom components that extend a no/low-code foundation as needed.
* Understanding of cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, and system performance tuning.
* Comfortable diving into unfamiliar territory, driven by curiosity and ambition.

title: IT-tekniker 3rd line support
description:
Centric har just nu flera kunder som är i behov av supporttekniker på 3rd line nivå.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Som tekniker på 3rd line arbetar du bland annat med systemförbättringar, drift och underhåll av operativsystem och produktapplikationer i olika IT-miljöer.
   

  

 Dessutom hjälper du till med nyinstallationer, uppgraderingar och andra typer av förbättringsarbeten.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att lyckas i din roll som tekniker inom 3rd line / senior IT-tekniker har du en naturlig känsla för service och trivs med att arbeta kvalitativt och långsiktigt. Du gillar att arbeta både individuellt samt som en del i en grupp. Du är väl införstådd med vikten av processer och dokumentation. Du är lyhörd samt utrustad med ett riktigt starkt driv. Det faller sig naturligt att för dig att se effektiviserings- och förbättringsmöjligheter och du har ett brinnande tekniskt intresse. Du har erfarenhet av drift och support, och vi ser gärna att du drivit olika förändringsprojekt tidigare.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Krav**
* 3-5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter
* Windows Server (Infrastruktur samt inbyggda funktioner)
* Powershell, VB script
* Microsoft Office365
* Erfarenhet av installation, drift, felsökning, underhåll av större Windows server miljöer
* Erfarenhet av installation, drift, felsökning, underhåll av 3:e parts applikationer på Windows
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Microsoft SQL-server
* Microsoft Azure
* Microsoft Exchange
* Server virtualisering (VMware eller HyperV)
* Citrix/Cisco produkter
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av lagringslöningar
* Klientmanagering
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av arbete enligt ITIL
* Certifieringar från Microsoft eller andra relevanta certifieringar
* Körkort B
* Högskoleutbildning med teknisk inriktning eller annan utbildning och erfarenhet som vi anser likvärdig


 LÅTER DET INTRESSANT?
   

  

 Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande så registrera din ansökan redan idag.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.
